name: Alone (itch) (Matt J E)
description:
Alone is the story of Alex. You will be following Alex on their journey through life after the pandemic. There is no perception between reality and the fragments of their mind, and something doesn’t seem right. In this suspense Horror RPG with Visual Takes from 2020’s Pandemic and California Fires you will battle your own demons in an ominous reality filled with ash and Self-Learning.

Alone was made for CST 421- Game Design II’s Fall 2020 Class. Our goal was to develop a game that allows players to see a different perspective of mental health and what experiencing it could be like for some people.

Alone was developed by Rodrigo Barreras, Matthew Escobar, Cheyenne Goddard, Sam Livingston, and Justin Tyler.
